game.name: Card Storm Idle HD
game.shortDescription: Card Storm Idle HD is an incremental game with both idle and active playstyles. Research and craft card deсk to earn as much resource as possible! Build up your power and see how far you can get. Bring the card storm down on paper monsters!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Card Storm Idle HD is an incremental game with both idle and active playstyles. Research and craft card deсk to earn as much resource as possible! Build up your power and see how far you can get. Bring the card storm down on paper monsters!
